Title: Mandates a code of ethics to be applied to school district employees in the prohibition of the use of school resources for personal gain
Summary: Mandates the trustees of common school districts and the board of education of every union free school district to establish a code of ethics to be applied to the prohibition of the use of school resources for personal gain.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to mandating the trustees of common school districts and the board of education of every union free school district to establish a code of ethics to be applied to the prohibition of the use of school resources for personal gain
